author: ts:ez.no
msg: - Updated example regarding new crop filter parameter names.

author: ts:ez.no
msg: - Rename parameters of the "crop" filter. The crop filter is now used with start-coordinates and width/height, instead of start and end coordinates.
# Request by Bard and makes sense.

author: fh:ez.no
msg: - Made the exposed interface of ezcMailSmtpTransport private. It is very unlikely that anyone would ever want to extend from it. If they want to, copying it is probably the better option anyway since the methods are very tightly coupled.
